name: Conditional Flow Workflow
description: A workflow with conditional routing based on LLM output

nodes.name: Analyze Sentiment
nodes.prompt: Analyze the sentiment of the following text: {input_text}. Respond with 'positive', 'negative', or 'neutral'.

nodes.name: Handle Positive
nodes.prompt: The sentiment was positive. Generate an encouraging response.

nodes.name: Handle Negative
nodes.prompt: The sentiment was negative. Generate a supportive response.

nodes.name: Handle Neutral
nodes.prompt: The sentiment was neutral. Generate a balanced response.
